headline: Kratos Contract Wins Deepen Role In Hypersonics Propulsion And Space Systems
summary: Kratos Defense & Security Solutions (NasdaqGS:KTOS) recently secured multiple government and commercial contracts in hypersonic technologies, aerospace propulsion, and satellite ground systems. The company won a joint U.S. Air Force contract with GE Aerospace to develop the GEK1500 engine for Collaborative Combat Aircraft. Kratos also obtained a new hypersonic vehicle materials testing program, expanding its role in next generation defense technologies. For you as an investor, these wins...
